com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest.impl

Class RestfulClientFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest.impl.RestfulClientFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RestfulClientBuilder

    public class RestfulClientFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements RestfulClientBuilder

    Implementation of RestfulClientBuilder for creating new, configured instances of RestfulClient.

    Version:
    1.0 03/28/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

      • registerDeserializer

        public <E> RestfulClientBuilder registerDeserializer(java.lang.Class<E> type,
                                            Deserializer<E> deserializer)
        Description copied from interface: RestfulClientBuilder
        Registers a Deserializer for the given Class type. This deserializer will be used to deserialize any objects of the given type. Registering a Deserializer for a Class which already has a Deserializer registered for it will result in the previous Deserializer being overridden.
        Specified by:
        registerDeserializer in interface RestfulClientBuilder
        Parameters:
        type - the Class associated with this deserializer
        deserializer - the JsonDeserializer to register
        Returns:
        RestfulClientBuilder to allow for method chaining

      • registerTypeAdapter

        public <E> RestfulClientBuilder registerTypeAdapter(java.lang.Class<E> type,
                                           RestfulTypeAdapter<E> adapter)
        Description copied from interface: RestfulClientBuilder
        Registers the given RestfulTypeAdapter for the specified Class with this RestfulClientBuilder instance. The RestfulTypeAdapter allows a Field of this type to be mapped to a resource field in a web service. Registering a RestfulTypeAdapter for a Class which already has a RestfulTypeAdapter registered for it will result in the previous RestfulTypeAdapter being overridden.
        Specified by:
        registerTypeAdapter in interface RestfulClientBuilder
        Parameters:
        type - the Class this RestfulTypeAdapter is for
        adapter - the RestfulTypeAdapter to register
        Returns:
        RestfulClientBuilder to allow for method chaining
